sentence.Network_en: Do children react to kind treatment by becoming more selfconfident?
sentence.Network_cn: 对孩子们和善是否会使他们更有信心?

list.abs: 什么意思... ... selfconfidence and selfstimulation 自信自强 boundless selfconfidence 没有界限的自信.
selfconcept 自我概念, selfconfidence 自信心, selfconcern 利己
develop selfconfidence :培养自信第四遍阅读:总结大副词与动词、形容词的搭配使用大副词主要指表示方式和程度的副词。英语学习者普遍不善于使用大副词。英语副词.

entry.def: Someone who is self-confident behaves confidently because they feel sure of their abilities or value.

example.ex: She'd blossomed into a self-confident young woman.
example.tran: 她已长大成为了一个自信的年轻女性。

auth_sentence.content: This is the fair embodiment of an inner-city byway diverse, selfconfident, obscure.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the fair embodiment of an inner-city byway diverse, selfconfident, obscure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the fair embodiment of an inner-city byway diverse, selfconfident, obscure.
